abstract: When Senator Marco Rubio, the Florida Republican, reached for a bottle of Poland Spring water on Tuesday night during the Republican response to President Obama’s State of the Union address, social media exploded with mentions of the brand. Poland Spring offered a comment in social media on Wednesday.
